tagline: Automated door locking system built with Lego Mindstorms. Android app + nxt project code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
LegoitronV1
![LegoitronV1 picture](https://www.dropbox.com/s/q8l2pskrfhaymyy/LegoitronV1.png)

Automated door locking system built with Lego Mindstorms and controlled with an Android app.

Inspired by Lockitron. (https://lockitron.com/)

Source released under the GPL v3
name: Legoitron
